DOC.brief_summary: Study Plitidepsin ( Aplidin® ) determine recommend dose ( RD ) plitidepsin Combination Bortezomib Dexamethasone Patients Relapsed and/or Refractory Multiple Myeloma .
DOC.brief_title: Study Plitidepsin ( Aplidin® ) Combination With Bortezomib Dexamethasone Patients With Multiple Myeloma
DOC.detailed_description: Phase I Multicenter , Open-label , Dose-escalating Clinical Pharmacokinetic Trial Plitidepsin ( Aplidin® ) determine recommend dose ( RD ) plitidepsin combination bortezomib dexamethasone patient relapse and/or refractory multiple myeloma ( MM ) , determine efficacy combination plitidepsin/bortezomib/dexamethasone , evaluate safety tolerability combination patient relapse and/or refractory MM study pharmacokinetics ( PK ) pharmacodynamics ( PDy ) plitidepsin combination bortezomib dexamethasone .
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year . Prior autologous transplantation ( HSCT ) patient allow . Patients must receive least one previous treatment line induction , chemotherapy , chemotherapy transplantation previous treatment bortezomib another proteasome drug Previous treatment plitidepsin . Active metastatic primary malignancy MM . Serious concomitant systemic disorder History hypersensitivity reaction bortezomib , polyoxyl 35 castor oil mannitol Neuropathy Pregnant and/or lactate woman HIV infection Active hepatitis B C virus infection . Treatment Investigational Medicinal Product ( IMP ) 30 day inclusion study Plasma cell leukemia time study entry Contraindication use steroid
